metadata.synopsis: The dialog is triggered in case that the player who was trapped in the lamp escapes while the djinni is speaking to other players in LOW_DjinniTrap_Antagonist_0188fd1b-39bb-ffa9-a80b-ea5cc7451d37 dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to 49; 0; -144 and try to use the shovel in this area- You can add the shovel with "create OBJ_Tool_Shovel" Recon call- Your character will dig out the treasure chest and you need to pick up the lamp in the chest - the dialog with the lamp should be triggered- Touch the lamp in the dialog- The djinni will appear and start this dialog with other party members- Cast "Find Familliar" spell with the player who got trapped in the lamp, it will escape and this dialog will be triggered

2.speaker: Yafeu
2.text: Saintly stars and blessed stones - you escaped!

6.speaker: Yafeu
6.text: I wasn't the ding-a-ling who touched the lamp - but oh well. I do live to serve after all.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I did - now leave, before I kill you for trapping me.

4.speaker: Yafeu
4.text: You are as gracious as you are skilled. My advice? Destroy the lamp. Toodles!

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Only an idiot would stay trapped in that lamp.
7.context: NodeContext: kind of insane and losing his mind at the end - disbeliving, on the brink of violence

5.speaker: Yafeu
5.text: Seas rose and fell while I rotted in that prison - yet you mock me? Ha. Haha.
5.context: NodeContext: kind of insane and losing his mind at the end - disbeliving, on the brink of violence

1.speaker: Yafeu
1.context: NodeContext: preparing for combat. Vicious and a little insane sounding
